name: Panda Kids Zoo Games
description:
A panda cub from our Zoo needs your care: getting fed, bathed and put to bed. Hello children and welcome to the Kids Zoo Games series. The main character of this game is a cute red panda cub named Babu. You’ll have a lot of fun together, but you also need to take care of her.

• Fun, entertaining and intuitive game for children.
• Care for a panda cub like a zoo keeper.
• Babu could be ill; can you do the job of a doctor?
• Original drawings and animations.
• Trustworthy game with regulated ads.
• The game is free!
